    • Uses of Question in deck

      Methods in deck that return Question 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Question Deck.getCurrentQuestion()
      Gives the question of the current (ie root) element of the list.
      Question DeckEle.getQuestion()
      Gives the question contained by the DeckElement
      Question Deck.next()
      Moves the root to the next element.
      Methods in deck that return types with arguments of type Question 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> Deck.getAllQuestions()
      Gives an ArrayList containing all the different questions contained by the deck.
      Methods in deck with parameters of type Question 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Deck.addQuestion(Question q)
      Adds the question given as parameter at the end of the list
      void DeckEle.setQuestion(Question q)
      Sets the question contained by the element to the question provided as argument.
